-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Suite of general utility scripts I use to navigate life.
--   
--   Please see README.md
@package jle-utils
@version 0.1.1.0

module JUtils.GHPages

-- | Runs <tt>updatepages'</tt> at the default log level, <a>LevelInfo</a>.
updatePages :: FilePath -> Maybe FilePath -> Maybe Text -> IO ()

-- | Runs <a>updatePagesLogging</a> with the given log level.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>silent: <a>LevelError</a></li>
--   <li>normal: <a>LevelInfo</a></li>
--   <li>verbose: <a>LevelDebug</a></li>
--   </ul>
updatePages' :: LogLevel -> FilePath -> Maybe FilePath -> Maybe Text -> IO ()

-- | Replaces the gh-pages branch with the contents of the given directory.
updatePagesLogging :: (MonadMask m, MonadLogger m, MonadUnliftIO m) => FilePath -> Maybe FilePath -> Maybe Text -> m ()
